adminpw.title: Admin Password
adminpw.warning: Your new password cannot be the same as your old password

security.apply_success_tips: Applied Successfully; waiting for the web server to restart.
security.enable_ipaddr_label: Allow Remote Access from Specific IPs
security.enable_ipaddr_tips: Add multiple specific IP addresses to manage the router from this device.
security.port_disabled_tips: This port is forbidden by the browser
security.add_ipaddr_tips: An example of the IP address style you can enter is (also supports IPv6 format) e.g.192.168.8.1, e.g.192.168.8.1/24.
security.session_timeout_tips: Interval between closing or hibernating the browser page and logging out.
security.port_conflict_tips: That port is already in use.

curity.port_conflict_tips: That port is already in use.
